players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
You: "Diana, why are you so sure about Charlie? Did you investigate him last night?"
Charlie: "Diana, that's a bold accusation without any evidence. Why are you so quick to point fingers? Alice has a good point."
Diana: "Diana here again. I am the detective and I confirm Charlie is mafioso. If you doubt me, ask Alice to consider my role and vote with us. We must act now to save the town."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me last night? You'd have no proof. This feels like a desperate mafia play to frame me."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you claim to investigate Charlie when Bob was killed? That doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
